Cristian Morataya Game Developer / Software Developer

About Me Projects

My Expertise

I'm software developer with emphasis in programming skills, but also database knowledge, testing, design and project configuration. Lately introduced in the game development world, specially in the programming and art area. For development use any open source solution, and my primary OS is GNU/Linux.

Tools

The main IDE for programming is Vim, but any IDE is good, like Netbeans or any IDE developed by Intelli J For version control use Git.

Code

Know a widely common programming languages, but primary use python for scrippting and lightweight applications, Java for robust apps, php for quickly development, for database i use SQL, and for game programming mostly gdScript and C#.

Design / Sound

In this branch i use Audacity and LMMS for sound design, and for visual design i mainly use Gimp, also photoshop.
